english.segment1: I am found in Your embrace. Covered by Your love. You're my deepest dream I know. Your love so strong, Spirit come
english.segment2: You lift me up to heaven's door. You restored my soul. I come here without Your touch. I need You so much, need You more
english.segment3: Refrain: You're my rock and my redeemer. The rock on which I stand
english.segment4: Chorus: I keep falling in love with You Lord. Every beat of my heart, breath that I take. Through the seasons that change. Your love remains. My hiding place, my home. Fallin' in love
